channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Badass Brides
channel.desc: Amy is set on a 'twisted Christmas' theme for her big day, which includes marking the event with tattoo ink. (S1, ep3).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ink Master Redemption
channel.desc: Honour is on the line as Lydia Bruno and Lalo return to redeem their mistakes on unhappy military veteran Canvases. (S2, ep10).
